openings.title: Software Engineer
openings.description: Join our engineering team to build revolutionary AI-powered fitness solutions that transform how millions of people approach their health and wellness journey. You'll work with cutting-edge ML models and scalable cloud infrastructure.
exReq: 3+ years of experience in software development with Python
Strong proficiency in TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar ML frameworks
Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Experience with RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
Knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and system design
Familiarity with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field

openings.title: Product Manager
openings.description: Drive the product vision and strategy for Back&Bone's innovative fitness applications. Shape the future of personalized fitness experiences by translating user needs into breakthrough product features that motivate and inspire.
exReq: 5+ years of experience in product management, preferably in tech or fitness
Deep understanding of fitness industry trends and user behavior
Proven track record of launching successful consumer products
Excellent communication, presentation, and leadership skills
Experience with agile development methodologies and product analytics
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities
MBA or relevant advanced degree preferred

openings.title: UX/UI Designer
openings.description: Create intuitive, beautiful, and engaging user experiences for our mobile fitness applications. Design interfaces that motivate users to achieve their fitness goals while ensuring accessibility and usability across diverse user groups.
exReq: 3+ years of experience in UX/UI design for mobile applications
Strong portfolio showcasing mobile app designs and user-centered solutions
Expert proficiency in design tools (Figma, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite)
Experience with user research, usability testing, and design thinking
Knowledge of iOS and Android design guidelines and best practices
Understanding of accessibility principles and inclusive design
Bachelor's degree in Design, HCI, or related field preferred

openings.title: Marketing Specialist
openings.description: Lead creative digital marketing campaigns that inspire and grow our global fitness community. Drive user acquisition and engagement through data-driven strategies across multiple channels while building brand awareness.
exReq: 3+ years of experience in digital marketing with proven growth results
Expertise in SEO, SEM, social media marketing, and content strategy
Proficiency with marketing analytics tools (Google Analytics, Facebook Ads)
Strong copywriting skills and creative campaign development
Experience with email marketing, conversion optimization, and A/B testing
Data-driven mindset with ability to analyze and optimize campaign performance
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field

openings.title: DevOps Engineer
openings.description: Build and maintain scalable, secure, and reliable cloud infrastructure that powers our AI-driven fitness platform. Ensure high availability and performance for millions of users while implementing best practices in automation and monitoring.
exReq: 4+ years of experience in DevOps, SRE, or cloud infrastructure roles
Strong expertise with AWS, GCP, or Azure cloud platforms
Proficiency in Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Experience with containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes)
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and logging solutions
Scripting skills in Python, Bash, or similar languages
Experience with security best practices and compliance frameworks

openings.title: Data Scientist
openings.description: Leverage advanced analytics and machine learning to create personalized fitness experiences that adapt to each user's unique goals, preferences, and progress. Turn data into insights that drive product innovation and user success.
exReq: 3+ years of experience in data science or machine learning roles
Strong proficiency in Python, R, and SQL for data analysis
Experience with ML frameworks (scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Knowledge of statistical analysis, A/B testing, and experimental design
Experience with big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop) is a plus
Strong communication skills to translate complex findings into actionable insights
Master's or PhD in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or related field
